climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Organic tampons free of chlorine bleaching, pesticides, rayon, fragrances, or dyes
A grip that helps prevent the slip
A core that gently expands to fit your body shape
body.description: L. believes access to period care is a fundamental right for everybody. By supporting local organizations who make and donate pads, increase education, create access to opportunity and work to reduce menstruation taboos, L. strengthens its collective action for lasting change. Love begins with L.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: L. The Proof is in the Period. Clean Period Protection With L. Organic Cotton Tampons L. believes that all bodies deserve some love, and that includes clean and simple quality period care. With L. Organic Cotton Tampons you'll get dependable protection any day of your period, because high-quality period care is a fundamental right for every body. Made with organic cotton, the tampons are free from chlorine bleaching, pesticides, rayon, fragrances, or dyes. They come in Regular and Super to reliably help protect yourself against leaks any day of your period.

Quality Period Care for Every Body Quality Period Care for Every Body L. Organic Cotton Tampons are made with organic cotton, for period care that won't stress out your budget. Clean and Simple Period Care Organic tampons free from chlorine bleaching, pesticides, rayon, fragrances, or dyes – for clean and simple period care. Full-Size BPA-Free Plastic Applicator L. tampons come with a full-size BPA-free plastic applicator, to make insertion clean and easy for comfort and convenience.

L. Is For Loving Everyone Making Period Care Accessible " The L. solidarity program is a one-for-one model that gives back to communities with every purchase; every time you buy L. one period care product is made accessible to someone around the world who needs it. With the one-for-one model, L. supports non-profit organizations to increase access to period products. This is achieved by the distribution of pad-making machines in high-impact communities to help ensure that they maintain access to clean and sustainable period care products for years to come.

L. Stands in Solidarity L. stands in solidarity with those who lack access to period care and strives to increase period equity, period and reproductive health education as well as long-term employment. By granting awards to projects and organizations that share L.'s model of giving, L. is on a mission to increase opportunities for education, and is working to decrease period stigma.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that they have light flow, its so hard for me to find tiny tampons! Also, idk what it is, but I started realizing that while using any organic cotton tampons my cramps were mild? One day i was out of these and used a regular one, i had to take it out because of how much in pain i was, i dont have a medical explanation for this, it was just my experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great. To the company; I miss the old packaging with the the compact applicator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product being organic is less irritating that Nation Brand Tampons. They are comfortable to wear and absorb well. This is my new go to product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent price for amount
reviews.reviewText: They don't sell 84 pack in the stores. Regardless when you look at the price per count it is a big savings. A plus for me is the mix of light and regular, I don't think the name brands offer a mix. The best part is it's organic and I refuse to go back to the name brands I've been using for decades. The one hiccup is I've noticed the cotton is thicker thus harder to insert at times, and doesn't quite conform to your body so there are little gaps somewhere that allow leaks. Still I prefer to choose my health over stained underwear - just use a panty liner if that happens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thankful that there is an option made with organic cotton. These work the same as any other tampon as far as absorbency. Plastic applicators make them easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I always buy these tampons which clearly state on the box NO FRAGRANCE, came in smelling and infused with a strong perfume. so disappointed, I will just have to keep. buying my tampons from the drug store from now on,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Happy to have a more natural product to use! Packaging is great and is less plasticy than other big brands. I think the product works great! Would and have bought again.
